summary_md: In the latest year, France's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 39,441 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with a consumer price index inflation rate of 2.00% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG). The unemployment rate stands at 7.37% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), while the average life expectancy is 82.93 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country has a significant internet user base, accounting for 86.80%% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). Lastly, the export growth rate is 33.24%% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
